# Blood Tide, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] ([[Necrophagy Spells|necrophagy]])

**Level:** [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Components:** V, S

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5ft./2 levels)

**Target:** 1 living creature

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Deep Magic (Kobold Press), pg. 133

This spell functions similar to *[[Blood Tide (Spell)|blood tide]]* but lasts longer and has a more dramatic effect. A creature that fails its save against *greater blood tide* suffers a –4 penalty to all Intelligence-, Wisdom-, and Charisma-base checks. It also takes 3 [[S3.1A-C - Universal Monster Rules A-C (Bestiary 6 Apx)|bleed]]. A creature already suffering from *[[Blood Tide (Spell)|blood tide]]* takes a –2 penalty to its save against this spell.

A *[[Cure Moderate Wounds (Spell)|cure moderate wounds]]* or DC 20 [[Heal (Skill)|Heal]] check can stop the bleeding created by this spell.
